Package: grails.views.compiler

[Groovy] Class BuilderTypeCheckingExtension

          • grails.views.compiler.BuilderTypeCheckingExtension

          • An abstract type checking extension for view DSLs to implement

            Authors:
            Graeme Rocher

            1.0
